### User avatar using a base64 encoded URL

Here's chewie!

```js

// Here's a base64 encoded image of Chewie:
const avatarURL = 'data:image/jpeg;base64,';

<UserAvatar username="Chewie" avatarURL={avatarURL} />
```

### Placeholder

```
<UserAvatar username="No one" />
```

### Placeholder not set

The placeholder for users who are not set (e.g. as an assignee) are a bit more opaque.

```
<UserAvatar username="No one" notSet />
```
